aurora.mp4.description: Pip tries to mix a real aurora—only to end up wearing it! A glowy, sparkly mishap lights up the workshop. 🌈💫 #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #AuroraMixer #WhimsicalScience #AIAnimation #MagicInMotion #OtterInventor
aurora.mp4.title: Pip and the Aurora Mixer 🌈✨

ripple.mp4.description: Pip discovers a magical bowl of liquid light that turns his squeaks and taps into mesmerizing ripples—and one very glittery splash. 🌊✨ #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #RippleResonator #MagicWorkshop #WhimsicalScience #AIAnimation #OtterInventor
ripple.mp4.title: Pip and the Ripple Resonator 🌊✨

cocoa.mp4.description: Pip sings to a magical whisk that turns cocoa into music. #PipsProjects #CozyMagic #OtterChef #WorkshopWhimsy
cocoa.mp4.title: Pip and the Cocoa Mixer

leafs.mp4.description: Pip cycles through magical autumn leaves in a whirl of color. #PipsProjects #FallMagic #CuteOtter #WorkshopSeason
leafs.mp4.title: Pip and The Autumn Leaf Cycler

comfort.mp4.description: Pip brews a comfort cloud… which gets a little too cozy. #PipsProjects #CuteOtter #CloudTech #WhimsyScience
comfort.mp4.title: Pip and the Comfort Cloud
